package.name: DictMojiX
package.shortDescription: Replace dictation key with emoji key on iPhone X/XR/XS! Support iOS 11-13.

descriptionlist.description: Replace dictation key with emoji key on iPhone X//XR/XS! Support iOS 11-13. Long press to activate dictation.

changelog.change: Added compatibility with iOS 13. The icon is now a thumbsup since Apple doesn't provide access to the original icon in iOS 13.
